critique: The document is a formal announcement of the approval of a Code of Fair Competition for the Anti-Hog Cholera Serum and Hog Cholera Virus Industry. The tone is official and bureaucratic. The primary emotion the President wants to elicit is a sense of confidence and stability in the government's ability to address economic issues. There is a slight sense of hope that the policy will be effective. There is no indication of anger, fear, disgust, or surprise.
